title: cmd/gc, runtime: hashmaps hash padding bytes of struct.
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Use a map with time.Time as the key
2. Refer to the value of the key in that map later

What is the expected output?
 The same value

What do you see instead?
 A different value

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
OS X 10.7.5

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +87f67aadaed6 Sat Dec 22 17:41:00 2012 -0800 darwin/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.

Discussion: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/golang-nuts/lREbymz0nHw
Playground  example: http://play.golang.org/p/cpR5dyoNUD
Complex example: https://gist.github.com/4363771
Attachments: 1. test.go (688 bytes)
